name: BATTLE BEARS -1
description:
Battle Bears -1 is an action-packed 3D shooter with massive bosses, heaps of humor, tons of crazy weapons, and no shortage of fluffiness or shooting rainbows. This special PC edition includes all 3 campaigns, full HD cutscenes, and tons of new effects tailor made for your PC.

Join OLIVER, RIGGS and WIL on a space odyssey none of them are anywhere close to thrilled to be experiencing. Defend the flagship Ursa Major from an onslaught of confused creatures hewn from the deepest, darkest corners of the cosmos' disturbed imagination.

HOW TO PLAY:
To Move: Use WASD or Arrow keys
To Look Around: Use Mouse or Trackpad
To Fire: Click
To Pause: Esc
To Switch Weapons: Use Mouse Scroll or 1, 2, 3, 4 or 5
To Access MAP: Tab
